name: Bicarus
description:
Short platformer made for  32bit Jam 2021  Movement: WASD Pause: Esc Fullscreen: Yes. I Recommend

Considering poor ecological condition in the town, departure was an easy decision to make .

It was a matter of time to prepare route and launch site. As the  day comes, there was the only thing yet to be decided - the destination.

What lies up in the skies? Will the bee make it?

It is up to you, to find out.
